Discover tips and techniques to elevate your grooming routine with The Chairmanâ„¢ Pro.
How To Use The Chairmanâ„¢ Pro 
0:06 Step 1: Choose your blade head (foil vs. stubble). Whether youâ€™re looking for a smoother, closer shave or youâ€™re into leaving a little stubble behind. One of these interchangeable blade heads will have you covered. 
0:30 Step 2: While The Chairmanâ„¢ Pro can be used wet or dry, we recommend going in with a little Power Shave Gel before you start shaving for the ultimate experience. Apply it directly on your face, or onto the blade head to get started.
0:43 Step 3: Turn on The Chairmanâ„¢ Pro by pressing the power button once.
0:47 Step 4: Grip the ergonomic handle in whichever way feels more comfortable to you. 
0:55 Step 5: Once youâ€™ve found the sweet spot on your grip, gentle stroke your face in up and down movements and repeat as necessary until youâ€™ve perfected your shave.
1:23 Step 6: Get your final touches in with the precision blade. Use the precision lock and tilt the blade head at a 90-degree angle to take advantage of the precision trimming edge. Turn on the LED spotlight to help see any hard to reach areas or flat laying hairs.
1:41 Step 7: After all that shaving, youâ€™re going to need a cooldown. Grab Face Shave Soother and give yourself that post-shave reward. Power down your device once youâ€™re done!
1:50 Step 8: Remove the magnetic blade by gripping the device and pulling the blade head away from the grip. Gently shake out the hair from inside the blade head. After that, rinse the blade head under running water to get the remaining hairs. You can even power the device on while under running water to give it a more thorough rinse. Once youâ€™re done rinsing, set it aside and let it air dry.
2:05 Step 9: After your device is done air drying, reassemble it and charge it again before your next shave. When charging, the LED indicator will blink and youâ€™ll be back to a full charge in 60 mins. If you run out of battery early, your shaver only needs a 5 minute quick-charge for a full shave.
